General.Name: Yingkou Jinchen Mach Co Ltd
General.Description: Yingkou Jinchen Machinery Co., Ltd. focuses on vacuum coating technology, automation technology, and equipment intelligent solutions worldwide. It offers high-efficiency solar cell equipment & solutions, including TOPCon high-efficiency solar cell tube PECVD solutions, heterojunction solar cell PECVD solutions, solar cell injection machine, AOI testing equipment for solar cell, silicon wafer crack detection system, diffusion/thermal oxide/annealing loading and unloading machine, texturing process loading and unloading machine, wet etching loading and unloading machine, offline cassette loading automation machine, and plate PECVD loading and unloading machine. The company also provides high-efficiency solar module equipment & solutions, such as automatic taping machine, PV module automatic fitting paper corner protector, junction box soldering machine, multi-function busbar soldering machine, high-speed cell string automatic layup machine, solar cell shingling machine, EVA/TPT automatic cutting machine, automatic gluing machine, plate-chain-type curing line, EVA flatting machine, solar module EL/AOI machine, automatic dispensing and framing machine, automatic trimming machine, G-G module rework gantry robot, dual glass layup gantry robot, solar module fully automatic laminator, lifter, 90° flipping inspection unit, module flipping inspection unit, insulation pressure resistance testing unit, automatic frame-placement and framing machine, gantry robot for sorting, frame-placement gantry robot, sand belt corner grinding machine, IV testing unit, standard module storage stack, gantry storage stack, wide gantry storage stack, double glass spacer gantry robot, block return line, tooling return line, manually flipping inspection unit, curing gantry robot, solar module semi-automatic flipping machine, and glass loading gantry robot, as well as RTG remote control system. Yingkou Jinchen Machinery Co., Ltd. was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Yingkou, China.
General.Address: No. 95 XinGang Main Street, Yingkou, China, 115000
